ValidationRule.description: Check if Phone Number start with +36 or 0036
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR( AND(RecordType.DeveloperName ="HU_Contact", NOT(ISBLANK(Phone)), NOT(AND(OR(LEN(Phone)==11, LEN(Phone)==12), LEFT(Phone, 3) == "+36", ISNUMBER(RIGHT(Phone,LEN(Phone)-3))))),
AND(RecordType.DeveloperName ="HU_Contact", NOT(ISBLANK(MobilePhone)), NOT(AND(OR(LEN(MobilePhone)==11, LEN(MobilePhone)==12), LEFT(MobilePhone, 3) == "+36", ISNUMBER(RIGHT(MobilePhone,LEN(MobilePhone)-3))))),
AND(RecordType.DeveloperName ="HU_Contact", NOT(ISBLANK(OtherPhone)), NOT(AND(OR(LEN(OtherPhone)==11, LEN(OtherPhone)==12), LEFT(OtherPhone, 3) == "+36", ISNUMBER(RIGHT(OtherPhone,LEN(OtherPhone)-3))))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Phone Number should contain country code and not have spaces
